Population concentration is service-driven, not ideological

revealed_to_reader: Elara spent 2 hours staring at blank report template
3 weeks since her last check-in to Ashton
She typed a comprehensive falsified report with these elements:
EXECUTIVE SUMMARY: 'Charitable housing and social services network', 2.5 billion spent over 18 months, 4,500 residents, 19 buildings
THREAT ASSESSMENT: MINIMAL (bold), no weapons/genetic modification/revolution/external coordination
OPERATIONAL ASSESSMENT: Motivation 'personal rather than political', no charisma, no cult, no militia, 'well-funded charity project run by trapped man'
FUNDING SOURCE: Personal wealth from Earth currency sales, 'self-limiting situation', sustainable 3-4 years at 60+ million monthly
POPULATION ANALYSIS: 4,500 individuals (4,200 Gamma, 300 Beta), voluntary migration, no coercion, high retention due to 'service quality'
SUBJECT ASSESSMENT: Intelligent but not ideological, managed Drift addiction, no criminal activity, 'excessive trust in others' as flaw
RECOMMENDATIONS: Passive monitoring, no intervention, LOW PRIORITY, conclude investigation
She wrote addendum telling truth ('most effective social services I've seen in 8 years', 'Jax is not threat, he's indictment', 'proof one person can do more than station government')
She deleted the truthful addendum
Transmitted the false report
Ashton responded 6 hours later: believed it, suspended investigation, called it 'excellent work'
Free Level designated low-priority monitoring
She's being recalled for reassignment and debriefing
She found the family with stuffed elephant 2 days ago, returned it, mother cried, girl hugged elephant
Elara told Jax on the rooftop that night
She committed treason, will face execution if discovered
Jax offered: stay here, help build, permanently modify genetics
She accepted: 'I'll stay. I'll help build. I'll fight with you when they come'
She's giving up caste, career, family, entire life
Jax still doesn't completely trust her but believes she's trying
Quote: 'Welcome to the Free Level, Elara Quinn. Or whoever you decide to become'
Final status: Traitor to SSS, fugitive once discovered, Free Level resident
The Free Level is safe 'for now'
Ending: 'I was a traitor now. Good. The system deserved to be betrayed.'

report_contents_summary: Executive Summary: Charitable network, 2.5B spent, 18 months, 4,500 people, 19 buildings
Operations: Personal motivation, no ideology, trapped man, charity project
Funding: Personal wealth, self-limiting, 3-4 years sustainable
Subject: Intelligent, not ideological, managed addiction, trusts too much (flaw)
Recommendation: LOW PRIORITY monitoring, no intervention, conclude investigation
thematic_beats: Truth and lies in same sentences - choosing which to emphasize
Making revolutionary work sound harmless through framing
Deleted addendum - truth she couldn't send
Moment of transmission - point of no return
Feeling light instead of guilty - moral clarity
Becoming someone new versus who 'they made you'
